Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27452 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.6.9-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-27452 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.6.9-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package mariadb is earlier than 10.6.9-1, affected by CVE-2022-27452
